sentence: The sauna was on anyway and most hotels offer these to any guest paying for special rooms or services for me it just created bad will
Gym was extra this MUST be included
Only negative for me was there was a charge to use the gym pool facilities and felt that the price we paid for the room the use of the gym should be included as with other hotels we have booked
Fitness center larger and better than average
We also did miss the presence of spa services although we casually looked for a spa menu and spa button on the phone and concluded that it must not be offered
It is attached to the convention center and there was a lot of activity the weekend we stayed
Pool is gone and replaced by ridiculously large fitness center
For such a high star rated hotel I would expect more and at least a sauna hot tub area if not a pool
The exercise room is like a normal gym
Hotel has great fitness center no polWe were in room 1054 that was really too low for a great view but it was OK
This is the best gym of any hotel I have stayed in San Francisco equal to a fitness club like 24 hour fitness lots of cardio and friendly staff here enjoyed the apple after my work out
Excellent lobby and amenities especially 2story gym staff services are top notch
The fitness center was very nice
The check in process was smooth the room was nice the building felt up to date and upscale the exercise rooms were top notch and the check out was quick and easy
Great hotel fabulous gym good location
The gym is quite large and with top equipment
The hotel was kept spotless despite bustling with activity of conference goers and tourists
The fitness center is killer
I like the Gym and the inside yard

The good a Fully featured modern rooms b Great gym c Friendly staff d Good dining options nearby The executive lounge is pretty good although they have limited dietary options in their Hors dOeuvres if you are vegetarian they plate everything with meat which is unfortunate
